name: Zentail
headline: We're making ecommerce simple connecting brands with sales channels
description: Zentail makes adding online sales channels  for ecommerce brands as simple as adding a friend on Facebook.  Our mission is to make ecommerce simple and we do it with our ecommerce network that automates away all of the work getting a listing formatted for different marketplaces with different requirements.

# Take the guesswork out of your ecommerce strategy.
Mastering the right marketplaces is hard. We make it easy. Zentail's Revenue Growth Platform helps you focus on the channels that drive results, simplify your operations, and grow your sales faster than ever.
[Let's Talk](https://zentail.com/<https:/share.hsforms.com/1mTaDnWLXSnq7fpQQUEzsQw53b1z?__hstc=195120947.7d4a618325501ee0fba9c850734eded7.1739981871163.1739981871163.1739981871163.1&__hssc=195120947.1.1739981871164&__hsfp=1951743191>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62b4d5b8b3b541f5cdae0b1d/6797ef457243d45272c7ebee_hero-primary.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62b4d5b8b3b541f5cdae0b1d/6797ef4515fb8d50de7cf0a7_hero-gmv.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62b4d5b8b3b541f5cdae0b1d/6797ef4513a76b19209ba225_hero-stats.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62b4d5b8b3b541f5cdae0b1d/6797f2748c97285b7cfc37e6_buyers-primary.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62b4d5b8b3b541f5cdae0b1d/6797f2732f8633902f329691_buyers-amazon.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62b4d5b8b3b541f5cdae0b1d/6797f273dd366071a5437b3e_buyers-bigcom.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62b4d5b8b3b541f5cdae0b1d/6797f273061e6725e77b1135_buyers-shopify.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62b4d5b8b3b541f5cdae0b1d/6797f2737d9ed34a45b67091_buyers-walmart.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62b4d5b8b3b541f5cdae0b1d/6797f2741f36a8935bccf7b1_buyers-ebay.svg)
## Be where your buyers are – first.
Your most valuable asset is your time. And the most expensive cost to your business is a slow time to market. Zentail simplifies your marketplace strategy, helping you launch your listings on channels that matter most – where your buyers already are.With Zentail, you’ll save time and resources, minimize lost sales, and grow faster than ever. Unlike other platforms, Zentail ensures a seamless marketplace launch and optimization, so you can start generating sales from day one.
## Focused on the marketplaces that drive results
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62b4d5b8b3b541f5cdae0b1d/6797f647409a809a75f843c4_logo-amazon.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62b4d5b8b3b541f5cdae0b1d/6797f646dd366071a547b676_logo-walmart.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62b4d5b8b3b541f5cdae0b1d/6797f646d46beb459de2c00f_logo-target.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62b4d5b8b3b541f5cdae0b1d/6797f6468bc45a04f7e52c28_logo-ebay.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62b4d5b8b3b541f5cdae0b1d/6797f646b7278a4c562710cc_logo-shopify.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62b4d5b8b3b541f5cdae0b1d/6797f6472f8633902f36e39c_logo-bigcom.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62b4d5b8b3b541f5cdae0b1d/6797f6467820e67adb83d3aa_logo-newegg.png)
## Know where you’re losing sales – and fix it.
Zentail gives you the clarity to identify gaps in your sales on every marketplace, whether from new requirements, inventory issues, or listing inaccuracies. You’ll know exactly what’s wrong and how to fix it, fast.By centralizing all your sales data, Zentail provides a real-time view of your multichannel business. With automated insights and actionable recommendations, you can solve issues quickly. Make changes directly across any channel – no support tickets, delays, or back-and-forth emails required – keeping you in control and driving your team forward with smarter, data-backed decisions.
[Learn more![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62b4d5b8b3b541f5cdae0b1d/6797f1d4732ffcccacb2d340_arrow.svg)](https://zentail.com/</solutions/business-analytics>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62b4d5b8b3b541f5cdae0b1d/6797f97a7ac76d4ff15be921_sales-primary.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62b4d5b8b3b541f5cdae0b1d/6797f979967d93a73fb7f7de_sales-sku.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62b4d5b8b3b541f5cdae0b1d/6797f979f8681cf715d25387_sales-types.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62b4d5b8b3b541f5cdae0b1d/6797fa335171240ffb8f6e32_product-info_primary.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62b4d5b8b3b541f5cdae0b1d/6797fa37dd328c53993e0e57_product-info_toggle.svg)
## Say goodbye to templates and recipes.
No configurations, no mappings – just fast, effortless listing automation. Zentail’s SMART Types technology revolutionizes how you list products, making it possible to list a single SKU or an entire catalog with just one click.As marketplaces evolve and introduce new requirements, SMART Types automatically adjusts how your data is sent to ensure your listings remain compliant and optimized. This means less time spent maintaining listings, mappings and configuration and more time focused on growing your business.
[Learn more![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62b4d5b8b3b541f5cdae0b1d/6797f1d4732ffcccacb2d340_arrow.svg)](https://zentail.com/</solutions/product-information-management>)
## The results you need to succeed
Zentail delivers real, measurable results that help ecommerce brands thrive.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62b4d5b8b3b541f5cdae0b1d/6797f4a1049c35f1e2717e6d_icon-clock.svg)
3x
faster launches

99%
listing publish rate
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62b4d5b8b3b541f5cdae0b1d/6797f4a26fb9e1bb5e996154_icon-automate.svg)

## What sellers are saying
Trusted by ecommerce brands to simplify multichannel selling and drive growth. Hear from real customers who have transformed their businesses with Zentail.
Want to see results like these?

## Far out!
To be honest upfront—we may not be the best partner for you at this time. At your reported sales, <$100k, there are other tools that would be more cost effective to support your multichannel strategy.However, if you have big expansion plans and the ability to commit to a $12,000 investment we should talk to be sure we're the right fit for you. # Take the guesswork out of your ecommerce strategy.
Mastering the right marketplaces is hard. We make it easy. Zentail's Revenue Growth Platform helps you focus on the channels that drive results, simplify your operations, and grow your sales faster than ever.
Let's Talk⟨22⟩
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62b4d5b8b3b541f5cdae0b1d/6797ef457243d45272c7ebee_hero-primary.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62b4d5b8b3b541f5cdae0b1d/6797ef4515fb8d50de7cf0a7_hero-gmv.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62b4d5b8b3b541f5cdae0b1d/6797ef4513a76b19209ba225_hero-stats.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62b4d5b8b3b541f5cdae0b1d/6797f2748c97285b7cfc37e6_buyers-primary.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62b4d5b8b3b541f5cdae0b1d/6797f2732f8633902f329691_buyers-amazon.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62b4d5b8b3b541f5cdae0b1d/6797f273dd366071a5437b3e_buyers-bigcom.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62b4d5b8b3b541f5cdae0b1d/6797f273061e6725e77b1135_buyers-shopify.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62b4d5b8b3b541f5cdae0b1d/6797f2737d9ed34a45b67091_buyers-walmart.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62b4d5b8b3b541f5cdae0b1d/6797f2741f36a8935bccf7b1_buyers-ebay.svg)
## Be where your buyers are – first.
Your most valuable asset is your time. And the most expensive cost to your business is a slow time to market. Zentail simplifies your marketplace strategy, helping you launch your listings on channels that matter most – where your buyers already are.With Zentail, you’ll save time and resources, minimize lost sales, and grow faster than ever. Unlike other platforms, Zentail ensures a seamless marketplace launch and optimization, so you can start generating sales from day one.
## Focused on the marketplaces that drive results
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62b4d5b8b3b541f5cdae0b1d/6797f647409a809a75f843c4_logo-amazon.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62b4d5b8b3b541f5cdae0b1d/6797f646dd366071a547b676_logo-walmart.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62b4d5b8b3b541f5cdae0b1d/6797f646d46beb459de2c00f_logo-target.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62b4d5b8b3b541f5cdae0b1d/6797f6468bc45a04f7e52c28_logo-ebay.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62b4d5b8b3b541f5cdae0b1d/6797f646b7278a4c562710cc_logo-shopify.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62b4d5b8b3b541f5cdae0b1d/6797f6472f8633902f36e39c_logo-bigcom.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62b4d5b8b3b541f5cdae0b1d/6797f6467820e67adb83d3aa_logo-newegg.png)
## Know where you’re losing sales – and fix it.
Zentail gives you the clarity to identify gaps in your sales on every marketplace, whether from new requirements, inventory issues, or listing inaccuracies. You’ll know exactly what’s wrong and how to fix it, fast.By centralizing all your sales data, Zentail provides a real-time view of your multichannel business. With automated insights and actionable recommendations, you can solve issues quickly. Make changes directly across any channel – no support tickets, delays, or back-and-forth emails required – keeping you in control and driving your team forward with smarter, data-backed decisions.
Learn more![⟨25⟩](https://zentail.com/</solutions/business-analytics>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62b4d5b8b3b541f5cdae0b1d/6797f97a7ac76d4ff15be921_sales-primary.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62b4d5b8b3b541f5cdae0b1d/6797f979967d93a73fb7f7de_sales-sku.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62b4d5b8b3b541f5cdae0b1d/6797f979f8681cf715d25387_sales-types.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62b4d5b8b3b541f5cdae0b1d/6797fa335171240ffb8f6e32_product-info_primary.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62b4d5b8b3b541f5cdae0b1d/6797fa37dd328c53993e0e57_product-info_toggle.svg)
## Say goodbye to templates and recipes.
No configurations, no mappings – just fast, effortless listing automation. Zentail’s SMART Types technology revolutionizes how you list products, making it possible to list a single SKU or an entire catalog with just one click.As marketplaces evolve and introduce new requirements, SMART Types automatically adjusts how your data is sent to ensure your listings remain compliant and optimized. This means less time spent maintaining listings, mappings and configuration and more time focused on growing your business.
Learn more![⟨25⟩](https://zentail.com/</solutions/product-information-management>)
## The results you need to succeed
Zentail delivers real, measurable results that help ecommerce brands thrive.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62b4d5b8b3b541f5cdae0b1d/6797f4a1049c35f1e2717e6d_icon-clock.svg)

generated_description:
Zentail is the company that streamlines the e-commerce landscape for brands looking to sell across multiple channels. Founded in 2011 and part of Y Combinator's S12 Batch, the company is based in Columbia, MD, and operates with a team of about 30 people. Its mission is straightforward: to make e-commerce easy by connecting brands with sales channels efficiently—like adding a friend on Facebook, but for online sales.

At its core, Zentail helps e-commerce brands automate the tedious work of listing products on various marketplaces, each with their unique requirements. Their platform provides a central catalog, simplifying processes like order management, product data organization, inventory forecasting, and analytics. Think of it as a comprehensive toolkit that reduces the time and effort traditionally needed to manage listings across platforms like Amazon, Walmart, and Target.

Zentail’s technology, especially its SMART Types feature, allows users to automate the listing process either by single SKU or in bulk, adjusting for marketplace requirements on the fly. This adaptability means brands can save time, maintain high listing publish rates (over 99%), and drastically reduce manual data entry—by about 90%, in fact.

Customers rave about the flexibility, ease of onboarding, and exceptional customer support. They can identify sales gaps across channels quickly, make data-driven decisions, and keep their operations running smoothly—all vital capabilities in today’s fast-paced e-commerce world.

If you're an e-commerce brand looking to optimize your multichannel strategy and simplify operations, visit [Zentail](https://zentail.com) to book a demo and learn more about how they can support your growth ambitions. They not only provide the tools to manage your e-commerce sales but also insightful analytics to help navigate the complexities of online retail effectively.
